channel.title: Perfect SYI blocker ( servers who get attacked )
channel.description:
I downloaded Shards Revolution from R-S and decided too Fix all the bug's and Make It more Stable that It already Is.
Bug Fixes:
-Login Bug (welcome screen one) -Walking bug -Combat manager bug -Muted players bug -Fixed Syi (Thanks Graham) -Groud item and object loading fix. -Double login fix -Dupe Glitch -Edgville Multi Combat Glitch
Features:
Packaged Like a 377 Server. Increased Stability, Better than WinterLove. New NPC Structure Removed Thread Per Client
Download- http://www.mediafire.com/?dm4jzgwrmtx
Pictures Of SYI Blocking/Tracking
[IMG]http://i50.photobucket.com/albums/f336/enjoi19bucket/syi.png[/img]
Credits:
Graham ~Simon Me
